title: Future Scale (watch face)
description: Futuristic watch face for round and square watches based on color scales.• SETTINGS AVAILABLE ONLY IN WATCHES• Support round and square watches shaped• 10 stylish color themes• Full week calendar in squre watches• Current day or minute in round watches• You can switch to round watch face on squre shaped watches• Show auxiliary grid for newbie earthlings)• Ad-free
descriptionHTML:
Futuristic watch face for round and square watches based on color scales.


• SETTINGS AVAILABLE ONLY IN WATCHES
• Support round and square watches shaped
• 10 stylish color themes
• Full week calendar in squre watches
• Current day or minute in round watches
• You can switch to round watch face on squre shaped watches
• Show auxiliary grid for newbie earthlings)
• Ad-free
comments: Not very attractive Theres only 4 or 5 preset color combinations, none of which look particularly good. It's a nice concept for a watch face, just not very pretty.
So stupid And I really hated it
I can't customize it Moto 360 and Note 4 =/
